CustomField.formula: IF( IsClosed = false && Fecha_Limite__c >= TODAY() && Fecha_Limite__c <= TODAY()+1, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150N000006j5QC", "warning" ) , IF( IsClosed = false && Fecha_Limite__c < TODAY(), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150N000006j5QH","error"),""))
CustomField.label: Alerta
